constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 153 (Thursday, September 22, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 8975.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H8114]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: To provide States with the authority to name post offices located in the State, and for other purposes.
